tag.extravaganza.festive_balls.descripti: A colourful ball that can be thrown to safely richochet around.
tag.extravaganza.festive_rubbers.descrip: A colourful rubber block that can be used for building.
A colourful rubber ladder that can be used to climb vertically.
tag.extravaganza.trash_cans.description: A colourful trash can that can be used to dispose of items.
tag.extravaganza.ink_puddles.description: A colourful puddle of ink. It's quite slippery.
tag.extravaganza.confetti.description: A colourful collection of confetti that can be placed on the floor.
tag.extravaganza.paper_lanterns.descript: A colourful lantern that can be hung from ceilings or placed on the floor.
lore.extravaganza.ball_pit_registration_: A block that allows to set up your ball pool using a Wrench Aganza to manipulate its properties such as power or covered zone.
lore.extravaganza.common_festive_coin: A common token that can be used in a Ball Distributor.
lore.extravaganza.uncommon_festive_coin: An uncommon token that can be used in a Ball Distributor.
lore.extravaganza.golden_festive_coin: A rare golden token that can be used in a Ball Distributor.
lore.extravaganza.ball_distributor: A machine that produces Festive Balls when provided coins.
lore.extravaganza.ball_pit_content: A collection of Festive Balls that makes for a bouncy ball pit.
lore.extravaganza.wrench_aganza: A tool that can be used to configure Merry Go Rounds and Ball Pools.
lore.extravaganza.rubber_extractor: A tool that can be used to extract rubber from Hevea Brasiliensis Logs.
lore.extravaganza.rubber: An item that can be crafted into Rubber Blocks.
lore.extravaganza.golden_candy_cane: A sweet treat that can be eaten or crafted into a Wrench Aganza.
lore.extravaganza.green_candy_cane: A sweet treat that can be eaten or crafted into a Wrench Aganza.
lore.extravaganza.red_candy_cane: A sweet treat that can be eaten or crafted into a Wrench Aganza.
lore.extravaganza.cheeseburger: A highly nourishing meal made from Bread, Milk, and Steak.
lore.extravaganza.beesechurger: A highly nourishing meal made from Bread, Milk, and Steak.
lore.extravaganza.way_too_sugary_whiteca: A highly nourishing, yet hunger inducing, meal made from Cake and Sugar.
lore.extravaganza.cherry_balloon: A bright red balloon that can be placed, floating off into the air!
lore.extravaganza.creeper_balloon: A bright green balloon that can be placed, floating off into the air!
lore.extravaganza.garland: A colourful block that can be placed like chains.
lore.extravaganza.caution_wet_floor_sign: A block that warns of danger ahead. Be careful not to slip!
lore.extravaganza.hanging_lights: A block that can be placed on walls to light up your home.
lore.extravaganza.plant_dye: A pigment that can be used to recolor rubber a pale green.
lore.extravaganza.tear_dye: A pigment that can be used to recolor rubber a pale blue.
lore.extravaganza.merry_go_round: A festive carousel that rotates riders around!
lore.extravaganza.nymph_dye: A pigment that can be used to recolor rubber a pale pink.
lore.extravaganza.tomato_dye: A pigment that can be used to recolor rubber a vibrant red.
lore.extravaganza.hot_dog: A classic light meal featuring beef and a bun.
lore.extravaganza.hot_dog_with_mayonnais: A classic light meal featuring beef and a bun, coated in mayonnaise.
lore.extravaganza.popcorn: A bag of Popcorn, a sweet and salty snack!
lore.extravaganza.popcorn_machine: A machine that produces Popcorn when supplied with Empty Popcorn Bags.
lore.extravaganza.empty_popcorn: An empty bag that can be filled with Popcorn from a Popcorn Machine.
